CustomField.description: Set by Owner via User Record
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL ( Owner.Sales_Organisation_SAP_Code__c ,"EN60"), "EN60", IF( ISPICKVAL (Owner.Sales_Organisation_SAP_Code__c ,"VD30"), "VD30", IF( ISPICKVAL (Owner.Sales_Organisation_SAP_Code__c ,"VD10"), "VD10", "" )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set by Owner via User Record
CustomField.label: Sales Org SAP Code
